abstract: Knight Vinke Asset Management, which has a track record of initiating change at large companies, has found its latest target in Europe’s biggest bank.
snippet: Knight Vinke Asset Management, which has a track record of initiating change at large companies, has found its latest target in Europe’s biggest bank.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sept. 7 — Knight Vinke Asset Management, the investment firm with a track record of initiating change at large companies, has found its latest target in Europe’s biggest bank, HSBC Holdings.

headline.main: Investment Firm Aims to Shake Up HSBC
headline.print_headline: Investment Firm Seeks to Shake Up Big British Bank
